com.smartnsoft.droid4me.widget

Interface OnSizeChangedListener<ViewClass extends android.view.View>


  • public interface OnSizeChangedListener<ViewClass extends android.view.View>
    A simple interface method will be invoked every time its underlying size changes.

    It Enables to capture the event when the widget size changes.

    Since:
    2011.04.01
    Author:
    Ã‰douard Mercier

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onSizeChanged(ViewClass widget, int newWidth, int newHeight, int oldWidth, int oldHeight)
      Triggered when the widget view size has changed, and in particular when it is known for the first time.

    • Method Detail

      • onSizeChanged

        void onSizeChanged(ViewClass widget,
                 int newWidth,
                 int newHeight,
                 int oldWidth,
                 int oldHeight)
        Triggered when the widget view size has changed, and in particular when it is known for the first time.
        Parameters:
        widget - the view related to that event
        width - the new width
        height - the new height
        oldWidth - the old width
        oldHeight - the old height
